thread.title: Parliament needs to show acute videos of infections from LGBTQ+ engagements – Prophet Oduro
thread.title_full: Parliament needs to show acute videos of infections from LGBTQ+ engagements – Prophet Oduro

title: Parliament needs to show acute videos of infections from LGBTQ+ engagements – Prophet Oduro
text:
General News of Sunday, 24 December 2023
Source:
mynewsgh.com
Prophet Dr. Kofi Oduro is of the view that
[Parliament](/GhanaHomePage/people/person.php?ID=3205) needs to fast-track the process to pass the Anti-LGBTQI+ bill into law.
He believes the practice should not be countenanced in Ghana.
The prophet was speaking on Accra-based United Television when he made this known.
To him, if
[Parliament](/GhanaHomePage/people/person.php?ID=3205) thinks that LGBTQI+ needs to be practised in Ghana, hence the delay, they should be shown acute videos of infections from LGBTQ+ engagements to help them understand how bad the situation is.
“Have you seen someone who has had an acute infection from being gay or lesbian, among others? I think
[Parliament](/GhanaHomePage/people/person.php?ID=3205) should be shown videos of such people who have had infections in their anus.
"I know someone who came to Alabaster and left for Holland. He now has a rotten anus from these things. It’s madness and should not be countenanced,” he said.
He continued “I will urge our
[Parliament](/GhanaHomePage/people/person.php?ID=3205)arians that do the right thing and God will bless you. There is judgement awaiting all of us”.
